title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Park Newspaper
body: Obed Newspaper          Obed Wild and Scenic River is distributing its park newspaper! The link presented below will allow you to download a PDF version of this newspaper. Included are articles on rock climbing, whitewater paddling, and basic topics of general park information. The Obed WSR hopes you will find this newspaper both enjoyable and informative. Park Newspaper 2016 Spring/Summer Edition [2,168 KB PDF] Park Newspaper Archive (2011 to present) Nearby NPS site: Read the 2016 Big South Fork Newspaper Spring/Summer Edition [3,610 KB PDF]
